rows.label: tev000201_MSG0001
rows.name:
We would like to open up a shop here,
but traveling with you sounds like additional fun.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0002
rows.name:
What do you say, my friend?
Will you help us quench our thirsty knowledge?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000201_SEL0011
rows.name: Add L to your team.

rows.label: tev000201_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000201_SEL0021
rows.name: Decline L's request for now.

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0003
rows.name: Delightful! We will try not to get in your whey.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0004
rows.name:
Ahh. Most unfortunate. Should you change your mind,
we stand willing to join you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0009
rows.name:
Giogion can watch the store while we're away,
so we're free to accompany you whenever you
see fit to have us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0010
rows.name:
Shall we not travel the wilds of Mira while our thirst
for knowledge still hungers?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000201_SEL0031
rows.name: Add L to your team.

rows.label: tev000201_JNK0040
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000201_SEL0041
rows.name: Decline L's request for now.

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0011
rows.name: Delightful! We will try not to bet in your weigh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0012
rows.name:
Ahh. Most unfortunate. Should you change your mind,
we stand willing to join you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0017
rows.name:
Your mission involves seeking out unidentified
xenoforms? That sounds right up our alleyway![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0018
rows.name:
Please let us join you. We are quite confident that we
would be of much assistance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000201_SEL0051
rows.name: Add L to your team.

rows.label: tev000201_JNK0060
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000201_SEL0061
rows.name: Decline L's request for now.

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0019
rows.name: Delightful! We will try not to bee in your sway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0020
rows.name:
Ahh. Most unfortunate. Should you change your mind,
we stand willing to join you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0025
rows.name:
While we would relish the opportunity to help you
search for that mech you seek...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0026
rows.name:
Alas, we lack a mechanical body, and would be most
swiftly spotted by the tainted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0027
rows.name:
So we fear we must entrust this mission to you.
We hope you are feeling lucky, punk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0032
rows.name:
You received an emergency aid request from Irina's
team, my friend?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0033
rows.name:
Then we must make haste on the double time!
Please allow us to accompany you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_JNK0070
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000201_SEL0071
rows.name: Add L to your team.

rows.label: tev000201_JNK0080
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000201_SEL0081
rows.name: Decline L's request for now.

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0034
rows.name:
Your faith in us shall not be mislaid!
We will see Irina safely back home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0035
rows.name:
Ahh. Most unfortunate. Should you change your mind,
we stand willing to join you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0036
rows.name:
So you've been tasked with exploring Sylvalum?
It is a most strange land, with scenery quite unlike
anything around here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0037
rows.name:
The prospect sends our thirst for knowledge into a
frenzy of drinking. You must allow us to join you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_JNK0090
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000201_SEL0091
rows.name: Add L to your team.

rows.label: tev000201_JNK0100
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000201_SEL0101
rows.name: Decline L's request for now.

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0038
rows.name: Delightful! We will try not to get in your whey.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0039
rows.name:
Ahh. Most unfortunate. Should you change your mind,
we stand willing to join you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0044
rows.name:
Ah, what fortuitous timing! We are buying supplies to
make some new items, and it is costing us, as you say,
a lovely nickel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0045
rows.name:
We were just thinking what a perfect time it would be
to accompany you to Sylvalum. Are you game, friend?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_JNK0110
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000201_SEL0111
rows.name: Add L to your team.

rows.label: tev000201_JNK0120
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000201_SEL0121
rows.name: Decline L's request for now.

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0046
rows.name: Delightful! We will try not to get in your whey.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0047
rows.name:
Ahh. Most unfortunate. Should you change your mind,
we stand willing to join you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0048
rows.name:
It makes no sense... Why would Mr. Lao be involved
with the Ganglion?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0049
rows.name:
But perhaps it is folly to even speculate. Let us look for
truth straight inside the gift horse's mouth![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0050
rows.name:
We must travel to the Ganglion's headquarters
and ask Mr. Lao directly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_JNK0130
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000201_SEL0131
rows.name: Add L to your team.

rows.label: tev000201_JNK0140
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000201_SEL0141
rows.name: Decline L's request for now.

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0051
rows.name: Delightful! We will try not to bet in your weigh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0052
rows.name:
Ahh. Most unfortunate. Should you change your mind,
we stand willing to join you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0057
rows.name:
How we yearn to see this Lifehold Core that has been
sustaining the lives of our human friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0058
rows.name:
Please allow us to accompany you on this most
fateful of days![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_JNK0150
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000201_SEL0151
rows.name: Add L to your team.

rows.label: tev000201_JNK0160
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000201_SEL0161
rows.name: Decline L's request for now.

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0059
rows.name:
And all that ends well shall be well indeed.
We will fight for humanity with all of our vigor![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0060
rows.name:
Ahh. Most unfortunate. Should you change your mind,
we stand willing to join you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0065
rows.name:
Now that the Ganglion are on their last eggs, we were
considering opening a shop or something of that ilk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0066
rows.name:
Yet our thirst for knowledge about Mira remains ever
unquenched.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0067
rows.name:
If you plan to leave the city, we would be most grateful
for the opportunity to join you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_JNK0170
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000201_SEL0171
rows.name: Add L to your team.

rows.label: tev000201_JNK0180
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000201_SEL0181
rows.name: Decline L's request for now.

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0068
rows.name: Delighted to hear it! We will try not to bee in the sway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0069
rows.name:
Ahh. Most unfortunate. Should you change your mind,
we stand willing to join you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0070
rows.name:
Now that Luxaar is dead and the Ganglion are dusty
wind, there is no one who may stand in our way![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0071
rows.name:
Shall we not travel the wilds of Mira while our thirst
for knowledge still hungers?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_JNK0190
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000201_SEL0191
rows.name: Add L to your team.

rows.label: tev000201_JNK0200
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000201_SEL0201
rows.name: Decline L's request for now.

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0072
rows.name: Delightful! We will try not to get in the whey.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000201_MSG0073
rows.name:
Ahh. Most unfortunate. Should you change your mind,
we stand willing to join you.[ST:wait ]
